validityText:
There is no input provided to evaluate against the given input specification. The input specification requires a string of words describing an event or topic with a length between 1 and 200 characters. Since there is no input, it does not comply with the specification as it does not meet the requirement of having a length between 1 and 200 characters.

ERR
coverageEvalText:
The chatbot's output is "World", which seems to be one of the categories listed in the description as an example of a news article classification. The description mentions that a news article can be classified into one of the following categories: World, Sports, Business, Sci/Tech. Since "World" is directly mentioned as one of these categories, it appears to comply with the chatbot's description without requiring knowledge of the input.

OK
